Title: Good Men, Good Women

Actors: Annie Shizuka Inoh, Giong Lim, Jack Kao, Ah-Cheng
Plot: Intended as the concluding film in the trilogy on the modern history of Taiwan began with Beiqing Chengshi (1989), this film reveals the story through three levels: a film within a film as ...
